mapper.sql: id, waijian, yonghuwaijian, tizhong, kongfu, wanerxiaoshi, tanghuaxuehongdanbai, ganyousanzhi, zongdanguchun, gaomiduzhidanbaidanguchun, dimiduzhidanbaidanguchun, niaosuan, xueyagao, xueyadi, ctai, gucaozhuananmei, zongdanhongsu, chaomincfanyingdanbai, niaosu, jigan, yidaosukongfu, yidaosuerxiaoshi, bingcheng, zhengzhuang, qitajibing, shuimianqingkuang, beizhu, qitayaowu, jiankangzhuangkuang, zishu, shujuriqi, luruduan, shixiao, riqi
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(min(str_to_date(tj.shujuriqi,'%Y-%m-%d')),'%Y-%m-%d') as shujuriqi from tijian5s tj where tj.Yonghuwaijian=#{waijian}
